description: This Java class 'GlobalExceptionHandler' is a REST controller advice that manages exception handling across the application. It provides structured error responses for various exception types, ensuring consistent error messaging and status codes.

classes.name: GlobalExceptionHandler
classes.description: Handles exceptions globally in the Spring Boot application, sending structured error responses.

methods.name: body
methods.description: Creates a map containing timestamp, status, error message, and custom message for error responses.

methods.name: handleBadCreds
methods.description: Handles BadCredentialsException and returns 401 Unauthorized with an error message.

methods.name: handleNotFound
methods.description: Handles UsernameNotFoundException and returns 401 Unauthorized indicating invalid credentials.

methods.name: handleValidation
methods.description: Handles validation errors from MethodArgumentNotValidException, returning detailed field errors with 400 Bad Request.

methods.name: handleIllegalArg
methods.description: Handles IllegalArgumentException, returning a 400 Bad Request with the exception message.

methods.name: handleGeneric
methods.description: Handles any generic Exception not specifically caught by other handlers, returning 500 Internal Server Error.
